scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Wikis_WikiLinks_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#set($links = $core_v2_page.ParseQueryString($core_v2_widget.GetCustomValue('links','Link=wikiCreate&Link=wikiEditWiki&Link=wikiSubscribe&Link=wikiCommentSubscribe&Link=wikiLockPage&Link=wikiPageDelete&Link=wikiFavorite&Link=wikiPageShare'))) #set($hasLinks = false) #set($currentWikiPage = $core_v2_wikiPage.CurrentOrDefault) #set($currentWiki = $core_v2_wiki.Current) #set($currentGroup = $core_v2_group.Current) #set ($collapse = $core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('collapsed', false)) #set ($wikiLinks = $links.Values('Link')) #set ($linksToShow = $wikiLinks.Count * 2) #if ($collapse) #set ($linksToShow = 0) #end #foreach($link in $wikiLinks) #beforeall
    #each #set($url = false) #if($link == 'wikiSubscribe') #if ($currentWikiPage && $core_v2_user.IsRegistered($core_v2_user.Accessing.Id))
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('CF_WikiLinks_Subscribe')
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('CF_WikiLinks_Unsubscribe')
    • #registerEndOfPageHtml("widget.${core_v2_widget.WrapperElementId}.wikiSubscribe") #end #set($hasLinks = true) #end #elseif($link == 'wikiCommentSubscribe') #if ($currentWikiPage && $core_v2_user.IsRegistered($core_v2_user.Accessing.Id))
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('CF_WikiLinks_CommentSubscribe')
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('CF_WikiLinks_CommentUnsubscribe')
    • #registerEndOfPageHtml("widget.${core_v2_widget.WrapperElementId}.wikiCommentSubscribe") #end #set($hasLinks = true) #end #elseif($link == 'wikiPageShare') #if ($currentWikiPage) #set($url = $core_v2_wikiUrls.SharePage($currentWikiPage.Id, "%{Modal='False'}")) #if($url)
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('CF_WikiLinks_PageShare')
    • #else
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('CF_WikiLinks_PageShare')
    • #end #set($hasLinks = true) #end #elseif($link == 'wikiCreate') #if ($currentGroup) #set($url = $core_v2_wikiUrls.AddWiki($currentGroup.Id)) #if($url)
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('CF_WikiCreate')
    • #set($hasLinks = true) #end #end #elseif($link == 'wikiFavorite') #if ($currentWiki && $core_v2_bookmark.SupportsBookmarks($core_v2_wiki.ContentTypeId) && $core_v2_bookmark.CanBookmark($currentWiki.ContentId, $core_v2_wiki.ContentTypeId) && $core_v2_bookmark.CanUnBookmark($currentWiki.ContentId, $core_v2_wiki.ContentTypeId))
  • $core_v2_ui.Bookmark($currentWiki.ContentId, $core_v2_wiki.ContentTypeId)
    • #set($hasLinks = true) #end #elseif($link == 'wikiPageFavorite') #if ($currentWikiPage && $core_v2_bookmark.SupportsBookmarks($core_v2_wikiPage.ContentTypeId) && $core_v2_bookmark.CanBookmark($currentWikiPage.ContentId, $core_v2_wikiPage.ContentTypeId) && $core_v2_bookmark.CanUnBookmark($currentWikiPage.ContentId, $core_v2_wikiPage.ContentTypeId))
  • $core_v2_ui.Bookmark($currentWikiPage.ContentId, $core_v2_wikiPage.ContentTypeId)
    • #set($hasLinks = true) #end #elseif($link == 'wikiLockPage') #if ($currentWikiPage && $core_v2_user.IsRegistered($core_v2_user.Accessing.Id) && $core_v3_permission.CheckPermission($core_v2_wikiPermissions.LockPage, $core_v2_user.Accessing.Id, "%{ ContentId = $currentWikiPage.ContentId, ContentTypeId = $core_v2_wikiPage.ContentTypeId }").IsAllowed)
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('Wiki_WikiLinks_UnlockPage')
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('Wiki_WikiLinks_LockPage')
    • #registerEndOfPageHtml("widget.${core_v2_widget.WrapperElementId}.wikiLockPage") #end #set($hasLinks = true) #end #elseif($link == 'wikiPageUndelete') #if ($currentWikiPage) #set($url = $core_v2_wikiUrls.UndeletePage($currentWikiPage.Id)) #if($url)
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('Wikis_Page_Undelete')
    • #set($hasLinks = true) #end #end #elseif($link == 'wikiPageDelete') #if ($currentWikiPage) #set($url = $core_v2_wikiUrls.DeletePage($currentWikiPage.Id)) #if($url)
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('Wikis_Page_Delete')
    • #set($hasLinks = true) #end #end #elseif($link == 'wikiManageWiki') #if ($currentWiki) #set($url = $core_v2_wikiUrls.ManageWiki($currentWiki.Id)) #if($url)
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('Wikis_ManageWiki')
    • #set($hasLinks = true) #end #end #elseif($link == 'wikiEditWiki') #if ($currentWiki) #set($url = $core_v2_wikiUrls.EditWiki($currentWiki.Id)) #if($url)
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('Wikis_Page_EditWikiSettings')
    • #set($hasLinks = true) #end #end #elseif($link == 'wikiEditPage') #if ($currentWikiPage) #set($url = $core_v2_wikiUrls.EditPage($currentWikiPage.Id)) #if($url)
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('Wikis_Page_EditPage')
    • #set($hasLinks = true) #end #end #elseif($link == 'wikiPageHistory') #if ($currentWikiPage) #set($url = $core_v2_wikiUrls.PageHistory($currentWikiPage.Id)) #if($url)
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('Wikis_Page_PageHistory')
    • #set($hasLinks = true) #end #end #elseif($link == 'wikiPageArticle') #if ($currentWikiPage) #set($url = $core_v2_wikiUrls.Page($currentWikiPage.Id)) #if($url)
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('Wikis_Page_Article')
    • #set($hasLinks = true) #end #end #elseif($link == 'feature') #if ($core_v3_feature.CanFeature($currentWikiPage.ContentId, $currentWikiPage.ContentTypeId))
  • $core_v2_ui.Feature($currentWikiPage.ContentId, $currentWikiPage.ContentTypeId)
    • #set($hasLinks = true) #end #elseif ($link == 'convert' && $currentWikiPage) #set($convert = false) #set($convert = $core_v2_ui.ConvertContent($currentWikiPage.ContentId, $currentWikiPage.ContentTypeId)) #if ($convert)
  • $convert
    • #set($hasLinks = true) #end #end #afterall
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('more')
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('cancel')
#end #if($hasLinks == false) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" labelResourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" labelResourceName="CF_Title" defaultValue="${resource:Wikis_WikiLinks_Title_Options}" dataType="String" template="core_v2_tokenizedString" /> <property id="collapsed" labelResourceName="collapsed" defaultValue="false" dataType="Bool" /> <property id="links" labelResourceName="Wikis_WikiLinks_Links" defaultValue="Link=wikiCreate&Link=wikiEditWiki&Link=wikiSubscribe&Link=wikiCommentSubscribe&Link=wikiLockPage&Link=wikiPageDelete&Link=wikiFavorite&Link=wikiPageShare" dataType="Custom" template="core_v2_sortableList" height="300" key="Link"> <propertyValue value="wikiCreate" labelResourceName="CF_WikiCreate" orderNumber="1000000" /> <propertyValue value="wikiSubscribe" labelResourceName="CF_WikiLinks_Subscribe" orderNumber="1000001" /> <propertyValue value="wikiPageShare" labelResourceName="CF_WikiLinks_PageShare" orderNumber="1000002" /> <propertyValue value="wikiFavorite" labelResourceName="CF_WikiLinks_FavoriteWiki" orderNumber="1000003" /> <propertyValue value="wikiLockPage" labelResourceName="Wiki_WikiLinks_LockPage" orderNumber="1000004" /> <propertyValue value="wikiPageUndelete" labelResourceName="Wikis_Page_Undelete" orderNumber="1000005" /> <propertyValue value="wikiPageDelete" labelResourceName="Wikis_Page_Delete" orderNumber="1000006" /> <propertyValue value="wikiManageWiki" labelResourceName="Wikis_ManageWiki" orderNumber="1000007" /> <propertyValue value="wikiEditWiki" labelResourceName="Wikis_Page_EditWikiSettings" orderNumber="1000008" /> <propertyValue value="wikiEditPage" labelResourceName="Wikis_Page_EditPage" orderNumber="1000009" /> <propertyValue value="wikiPageHistory" labelResourceName="Wikis_Page_PageHistory" orderNumber="1000010" /> <propertyValue value="wikiPageArticle" labelResourceName="Wikis_Page_Article" orderNumber="1000011" /> <propertyValue value="wikiPageFavorite" labelResourceName="CF_WikiLinks_FavoriteWikiPage" orderNumber="1000012" /> <propertyValue value="wikiCommentSubscribe" labelResourceName="CF_WikiLinks_CommentSubscribe" orderNumber="1000013" /> <propertyValue value="feature" labelResourceName="CF_feature" orderNumber="1000014" /> <propertyValue value="convert" labelResourceName="Convert" orderNumber="1000015" /> </property> </propertyGroup>
scriptedContentFragment.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="cancel">Cancel</resource> <resource name="CF_feature">Feature</resource> <resource name="CF_Title">Widget Title</resource> <resource name="CF_WikiCreate">New Wiki</resource> <resource name="CF_WikiLinks_CommentSubscribe">Turn Comment notifications on</resource> <resource name="CF_WikiLinks_CommentUnsubscribe">Turn Comment notifications off</resource> <resource name="CF_WikiLinks_FavoriteWiki">Bookmark wiki</resource> <resource name="CF_WikiLinks_FavoriteWikiPage">Bookmark page</resource> <resource name="CF_WikiLinks_PageShare">Share</resource> <resource name="CF_WikiLinks_Subscribe">Turn Page notifications on</resource> <resource name="CF_WikiLinks_Unsubscribe">Turn Page notifications off</resource> <resource name="collapsed">Collapsed</resource> <resource name="Convert">Move page</resource> <resource name="more">More</resource> <resource name="Options">Options</resource> <resource name="Wiki_WikiLinks_LockPage">Locked</resource> <resource name="Wiki_WikiLinks_UnlockPage">Unlocked</resource> <resource name="Wikis_ManageWiki">Manage wiki</resource> <resource name="Wikis_Page_Article">View</resource> <resource name="Wikis_Page_Delete">Delete</resource> <resource name="Wikis_Page_EditPage">Edit</resource> <resource name="Wikis_Page_EditWikiSettings">Administer wiki</resource> <resource name="Wikis_Page_PageHistory">History</resource> <resource name="Wikis_Page_Undelete">Undelete</resource> <resource name="Wikis_WikiLinks_Description">Displays a list of common links.</resource> <resource name="Wikis_WikiLinks_Links">Select, rearrange, and enable the links to be displayed</resource> <resource name="Wikis_WikiLinks_Name">Wikis - Links</resource> <resource name="Wikis_WikiLinks_Title_Options">Options</resource> </language>
